titles.title: RAISE Act of 2025
RAISE Act of 2025
Recommending Artificial Intelligence Standards in Education Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to encourage States to develop academic standards for elementary school and secondary school for artificial intelligence and other emerging technologies.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
